name: Favourite Place
description:
*** Weird Issue: If the screen is black at the start and nothing shows up, refresh the page. There seems to be a proble serving some of the files. ****

Description

Reminisce with some friends.

This game is intended for local multiplayer (2-4), but you can play on your own if you're willing to pretend to be two  people.

Controls

  • Keyboard: arrow keys + space/enter
  • Mouse: move and click

Credit

Music and Audio by Neil Anderson

Story by Jennifer Lorigan and Neil Anderson

Programming by Cian Booth
